title: Hybrid Database Migration Completes Without Data Loss
description: Validate that the hybrid database migration extending Members and Donations tables with 81 new columns completes successfully without any data loss.

steps.description: Trigger the hybrid database migration process
Verify that all new columns are added to Members and Donations tables
Verify that existing data remains intact in all affected tables
Verify that no downtime or interruptions occurred during migration

title: UUID Migration for Member and Donation IDs
description: Ensure all primary keys for members and donations are migrated to UUIDs and services have no type errors or data integrity issues.

steps.description: Compile and run membersService and donationsService after UUID migration
Confirm no type errors or warnings during compilation
Validate that member and donation IDs conform to UUID format
Verify that existing data is correctly associated and intact after migration

title: Auto-Generation of Membership Numbers
description: Verify system automatically generates unique membership numbers in format MEM-YYYY-XXXXXX on member registration.

steps.description: Navigate to New Member Registration page
Fill all mandatory member fields with valid data
Submit the registration form
Verify that membership number is automatically generated in format MEM-2025-000001 (incremented)
Verify membership number is unique and stored in database

title: Auto-Generation of Donation Receipt Numbers
description: Verify donation receipt numbers are automatically generated in the format RCP-YYYY-XXXX on donation submission.

steps.description: Navigate to Donations submission form
Fill all required donation information with valid data
Submit the donation form
Verify receipt number is generated automatically and matches format RCP-2025-<uniqueId>
Verify receipt number is unique and saved in the database

title: Turkish Full-Text Search for Members Yields Relevant Results
description: Test the full-text search functionality optimized for Turkish language on members data, ensuring correct and relevant search results are returned.

steps.description: Navigate to Members search page
Input Turkish text queries with special characters and diacritics
Execute the search
Verify that search results include relevant members matching Turkish language nuances
Verify that no irrelevant or unrelated results appear

title: Turkish Full-Text Search for Donations Yields Relevant Results
description: Test full-text search on donations dataset with Turkish language support, confirming that queries return appropriate results.

steps.description: Navigate to Donations search page
Input Turkish language terms related to donors and donation metadata
Execute the search
Verify donations relevant to the query are included in results
Verify no results are missed due to language processing errors

title: Admin Analytics Dashboard Loads Correct Donation Summaries
description: Verify that advanced analytics dashboards correctly display donor-type based and monthly summarized donation statistics with real-time updates.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user
Navigate to Analytics Dashboard page
Verify monthly donation statistics load and match expected aggregated data
Verify donor-type based statistics categories display accurate counts and amounts
Verify dashboard updates reflect latest donation data after new submissions

title: Members Page UI Fixes and Form Submission
description: Verify that UI/UX fixes on the Members page are effective and forms submit successfully without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Members page
Verify all form inputs and dialogs render correctly according to updated UI
Edit a member's information and submit the form
Verify that form submission succeeds without warnings or validation errors

title: Legal Documents Page Fixes and Upload Functionality
description: Check that critical bug fixes for Legal Documents page are properly applied and document upload works flawlessly.

steps.description: Navigate to Legal Documents page
Upload a valid legal document file
Verify upload completes successfully and document appears in the list
Verify no UI glitches or errors during upload process

title: Authentication System Enforces Permissions and Security
description: Verify the authentication system with Supabase integration correctly enforces permission-based access control and refresh token flows.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected route without login
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login
Log in with user having limited permissions
Attempt to access admin-only route
Verify access is denied and unauthorized page is shown
Verify token refresh occurs upon expiry automatically and user remains logged in

title: CSRF and XSS Protection Are Effective
description: Test that CSRF tokens are validated and XSS inputs are sanitized preventing client and server-side vulnerabilities.

steps.description: Submit form requests without proper CSRF token
Verify server rejects requests due to missing or invalid CSRF token
Attempt injection of XSS vectors in input fields
Verify inputs are sanitized and no scripts execute or appear in output

title: Accessibility Compliance WCAG 2.1 AA Verification
description: Perform accessibility audits to confirm the application meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards including ARIA labeling and keyboard navigation.

steps.description: Run automated accessibility audit tools on key pages
Verify no critical or major accessibility violations
Manually test keyboard navigability and screen reader support on forms and main functionalities
Verify all interactive elements are accessible and ARIA attributes are correctly assigned

title: Error Handling and Logging System Captures Runtime Errors
description: Verify centralized error handling captures runtime errors and logs notifications appropriately without disrupting user experience.

steps.description: Trigger known failure scenarios such as network interruptions or invalid inputs in critical forms
Verify error boundaries catch the errors and display user-friendly messages
Verify errors are logged in the central logging system
Verify users receive notification alerts about error states

title: Performance Optimization Improves Query Response Times
description: Confirm performance improvements such as new database indexing and caching reduce query response times consistently.

steps.description: Execute common search and data retrieval queries before optimization
Record baseline response times
Apply new indexing and caching strategies
Repeat the same queries
Verify that response times improve noticeably over baseline

title: Donation Form Validation with Edge Cases
description: Test donation form with various input edge cases including extreme numerical values, special characters, and incomplete data.

steps.description: Open donation submission form
Input invalid values such as negative amounts, extremely large numbers, and script tags in text inputs
Attempt to submit the form
Verify proper validation errors display and submission is blocked

title: Permission Guard Prevents Unauthorized Data Access
description: Validate that the permission guard components prevent users from viewing or modifying data they do not have access to.

steps.description: Log in as a user with restricted permissions
Attempt to access restricted member, donation, and aid data pages
Verify access is blocked and user is redirected or shown unauthorized message

title: Real-Time Notification System Pushes Alerts Correctly
description: Check that users receive real-time notifications through the Smart Notification Center for system events and errors.

steps.description: Trigger system notification event (e.g., new donation or error)
Verify notification bell shows unseen alerts
Verify notification detail displays correct message and timestamp
Dismiss notification
Verify notification is removed from unseen alerts

title: Mobile Optimization and Responsive Form Behavior
description: Verify that the mobile-optimized forms and navigation work smoothly on various screen sizes and touch devices.

steps.description: Open key forms and pages on a mobile device or emulator
Verify UI components adjust layout appropriately for small screens
Verify touch interactions such as toggles and dropdowns operate without issues
Attempt form submissions with mobile keyboard and gestures
Verify no validation or submission errors occur due to mobile-specific interactions

title: Internal Messaging System Sends and Receives Messages Correctly
description: Test the internal messaging page to ensure messages are delivered and displayed properly within team collaboration.

steps.description: Navigate to Internal Messaging page
Compose and send a message to another user
Verify the message appears in the sender's chat view
Verify the message is received and displayed in recipient's chat view in real time

title: Data Import and Export Functionality Works Correctly
description: Verify that data import and export modules successfully process Excel, CSV, and PDF formats without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Navigate to data export modal
Export members data to CSV and Excel formats
Verify exported files open correctly and include expected data
Navigate to data import module
Import clean sample Excel, CSV, and PDF files containing data
Verify data is processed and imported without errors
